Our Journey

Crafting Dreams into Reality

At Elite Homes, we believe in the power of a well-constructed dream. Our journey in the world of construction is a story of dedication, commitment, and a deep-rooted passion for building spaces that define the essence of modern living. Our venture began with Mohammad Juned Killedar, Saddam Hussain Kuknoor, and Syed Furqanul Haque, the founders of our company. In 2017, they embarked on their construction journey as a small-scale service provider.

A Tradition of Excellence

Our path in construction follows a family tradition, passed down through generations. We are proud to follow in the footsteps of our ancestors and continue the legacy of creating exceptional living spaces.

Our Journey

Discover Our Construction Spotlights

Amenities

Discover Our Construction Spotlights

Gated Complex

Our gated complex is designed to offer you the peace of mind and security you deserve. This thoughtfully planned community provides controlled access, ensuring that you and your loved ones live in a safe and private environment.

Security Cabin

Our security cabin is the first line of defense in ensuring the safety and well-being of our residents. Located at the entrance of our gated complex, this cabin is staffed by trained security personnel who are vigilant and dedicated to your protection.

EV Charging Point

In line with our commitment to modern living and sustainability, our EV charging point is a feature that adds a touch of the future to our community. EVs are becoming increasingly popular for their eco-friendly and cost-effective advantages.

CCTV Surveillance

Your safety is paramount to us, and our CCTV surveillance system is a crucial component of our security infrastructure. This modern technology ensures that every corner of our community is under watchful eyes, providing you with peace of mind and a sense of security.

Video Door Phone

Our video door phone system is your high-tech gateway to secure and convenient access control. This innovative feature is a modern solution that enhances both security and convenience and allows you to see and communicate with visitors before granting them entry.

Landscape Garden

Nature's Oasis at Your Doorstep. Our meticulously designed landscape garden is not just a green space; it's a sanctuary of nature, tranquility, and beauty that enriches your daily life. We have created a harmonious and eco-friendly environment, where residents can reconnect with the outdoors and enjoy the benefits of lush, green surroundings.

Covered Car Parking

Protecting Your Investment, Rain or Shine. Our covered car parking area is more than just a convenience; it's an essential component of our commitment to providing a secure and comfortable living environment. This feature ensures that your vehicles are shielded from the elements and enhances their longevity.
